p: A total of 132 healthy, male Swiss albino mice weighing 20–28 grams (age of 6–10 weeks) were purchased from Ethiopian Public Health Institute, Adds Ababa. The mice were contained in a plastic cage and kept under standard laboratory conditions with 12 h light and dark cycles. Free access to standard pellets and water ad libitum were allowed to all groups of mice. Before starting the study, all mice were acclimatized to the laboratory condition of the department of pharmacology for about seven days. Animal handling and care were carried out according to international laboratory animal guidelines. 28 At the end of each experiment, all animals were sacrificed using halothane followed by cervical dislocation.
